title: 473.801 DEFINITIONS.
text:
For the purposes of sections 473.801 to 473.849, the terms defined in this section have the meanings given them.
"Local government unit" means any municipal corporation or governmental subdivision other than a metropolitan county located in whole or part in the metropolitan area, authorized by law to provide for the processing of solid waste.
"Agency" means the Minnesota Pollution Control Agency.
Unless otherwise provided the definitions of terms in section 115A.03 shall apply to sections 473.801 to 473.845.
"Commissioner" means the commissioner of the Pollution Control Agency.
MS 2004 [Repealed, 1Sp2005 c 1 art 2 s 162]
